title: 6000sqft House Framing with Custom Roof
description: Fully custom framing of a 6000sqft home featuring a large pitched roof and many unique features. Work included comprehensive custom interior framing with high-end windows and doors throughout.

gallery.caption: Insulated concrete form foundation with rebar.
Foundation complete with gravel base layer.
Structural wall framing for large-scale residence.
Custom pitched roof truss system installation.
Exterior sheathing and complex roof framing.
Weather barrier installation on custom framing.
Roof decking and gable end construction.
